languages.text: "Ты знаешь, я сторонюсь твоих собратьев и их навязчивого внимания. Отвлечь пару мон-кай и проскользнуть мимо было не так уж сложно..." {n}Встретив ваш взгляд, Ирлиэт понимающе кивает.{/n} "Полагаю, для тебя это не самая приятная новость".

"You know I avoid your kin and their obsessive attention. It was fairly easy to distract a couple of mon-keigh and slip past them..." {n}Meeting your eyes, Yrliet nods in understanding.{/n} "I suppose this is not pleasant news to hear."
languages.original_text: "Ты знаешь, я сторонюсь твоих собратьев и их навязчивого внимания. Отвлечь пару мон-кай и проскользнуть мимо было не так уж сложно..." {n}Встретив ваш взгляд, Ирлиэт понимающе кивает.{/n} "Полагаю, для тебя это не самая приятная новость".

traits.locale_text: "You know, I avoid your kinsmen and their obsessive attention. It was pretty easy to distract a couple of mon-keigh and get past them..." {n}Meeting your eyes, Yrliet nods understandingly.{/n} "I suppose this is not the greatest news for you."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You know, I avoid your kinsmen and their obsessive attention. It was pretty easy to distract a couple of mon-keigh and get past them..." {n}Meeting your eyes, Yrliet nods understandingly.{/n} "I suppose this is not the greatest news for you."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You know I avoid your kin and their obsessive attention. It was fairly easy to distract a couple of mon-keigh and slip past them..." {n}Meeting your eyes, Yrliet nods in understanding.{/n} "I suppose this is not pleasant news to hear."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You know I avoid your kin and their obsessive attention. It was fairly easy to distract a couple of mon-keigh and slip past them..." {n}Meeting your eyes, Yrliet nods in understanding.{/n} "I suppose this is not pleasant news to hear."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You know I avoid your kin and their obsessive attention. It was fairly easy to distract a couple of mon-keigh and slip past them..." {n}Meeting your eyes, Yrliet nods in understanding.{/n} "I suppose this is not pleasant news to hear."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “若你所知，我一直在避开你的族人和他们露骨的关注。若要引开几个猴子的注意，借机溜过去，这并不是什么难事……”{n}伊莉耶特与你对视一眼，会意地点了点头。{/n}“好吧，对你来说，这恐怕不是什么好消息。”
languages.original_text: "You know I avoid your kin and their obsessive attention. It was fairly easy to distract a couple of mon-keigh and slip past them..." {n}Meeting your eyes, Yrliet nods in understanding.{/n} "I suppose this is not pleasant news to hear."

traits.locale_text: “若你所知，我一直在避开你的族人和他们露骨的关注。若要引开几个猴子的注意，借机溜过去，这并不是什么难事……”{n}伊莉耶特与你对视一眼，会意地点了点头。{/n}“好吧，对你来说，这恐怕不是什么好消息。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «Sabes que evito a los de tu especie y su fijación por vigilarme. Ha sido muy fácil distraer a un par de mon-keigh y escabullirme sin que me vean...». {n}Cuando vuestras miradas se cruzan, Yrliet asiente comprensivamente.{/n} «Supongo que no te hace mucha gracia oír eso».
languages.original_text: "You know I avoid your kin and their obsessive attention. It was fairly easy to distract a couple of mon-keigh and slip past them..." {n}Meeting your eyes, Yrliet nods in understanding.{/n} "I suppose this is not pleasant news to hear."

traits.locale_text: «Sabes que evito a los de tu especie y su fijación por vigilarme. Ha sido muy fácil distraer a un par de mon-keigh y escabullirme sin que me vean...». {n}Cuando vuestras miradas se cruzan, Yrliet asiente comprensivamente.{/n} «Supongo que no te hace mucha gracia oír eso».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Vous savez que j'évite vos semblables, qui ont tendance à être trop curieux. Je n'ai pas eu de mal à détourner l'attention de ces quelques mon-keigh et à me faufiler discrètement derrière eux. » {n}Yrliet croise votre regard et comprend ce que vous avez en tête.{/n} « J'imagine que ce n'est pas vraiment une bonne nouvelle pour vous. »
languages.original_text: "You know I avoid your kin and their obsessive attention. It was fairly easy to distract a couple of mon-keigh and slip past them..." {n}Meeting your eyes, Yrliet nods in understanding.{/n} "I suppose this is not pleasant news to hear."

traits.locale_text: « Vous savez que j'évite vos semblables, qui ont tendance à être trop curieux. Je n'ai pas eu de mal à détourner l'attention de ces quelques mon-keigh et à me faufiler discrètement derrière eux. » {n}Yrliet croise votre regard et comprend ce que vous avez en tête.{/n} « J'imagine que ce n'est pas vraiment une bonne nouvelle pour vous. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Ihr wisst, ich gehe Euren Leuten und Ihrer obsessiven Aufmerksamkeit aus dem Weg. Es war recht einfach, einige Chem-Pan-Sey abzulenken und an ihnen vorbeizuschleichen ..." {n}Yrliet begegnet deinem Blick und nickt verständnisvoll.{/n} "Ich nehme an, das hört Ihr nicht gerne."
languages.original_text: "You know I avoid your kin and their obsessive attention. It was fairly easy to distract a couple of mon-keigh and slip past them..." {n}Meeting your eyes, Yrliet nods in understanding.{/n} "I suppose this is not pleasant news to hear."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr wisst, ich gehe Euren Leuten und Ihrer obsessiven Aufmerksamkeit aus dem Weg. Es war recht einfach, einige Chem-Pan-Sey abzulenken und an ihnen vorbeizuschleichen ..." {n}{n}Yrliet begegnet deinem Blick und nickt verständnisvoll.{/n} "Ich nehme an, das hört Ihr nicht gerne."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「我がお前の同族やその執拗な注意を避けていることは知っているだろう。二人組のモン＝ケイの気をそらし、彼らの横をすり抜けるのはかなり容易だった」{n}あなたの目を見て、ユリエットは理解したように頷く。{/n}「これはお前にとって、嬉しい知らせではないようだな」
languages.original_text: "You know I avoid your kin and their obsessive attention. It was fairly easy to distract a couple of mon-keigh and slip past them..." {n}Meeting your eyes, Yrliet nods in understanding.{/n} "I suppose this is not pleasant news to hear."

traits.locale_text: 「我がお前の同族やその執拗な注意を避けていることは知っているだろう。二人組のモン＝ケイの気をそらし、彼らの横をすり抜けるのはかなり容易だった」{n}あなたの目を見て、ユリエットは理解したように頷く。{/n}「これはお前にとって、嬉しい知らせではないようだな」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Senin türünden ve aşırı dikkatlerinden kaçındığımı biliyorsun. Birkaç mon-keigh'in dikkatini dağıtıp yanlarından sıyrılmak oldukça kolay oldu..." {n}Seninle göz göze gelen Yrliet, anlayışla başını sallıyor.{/n} "Sanırım bu, senin için kötü bir haber."
languages.original_text: "You know I avoid your kin and their obsessive attention. It was fairly easy to distract a couple of mon-keigh and slip past them..." {n}Meeting your eyes, Yrliet nods in understanding.{/n} "I suppose this is not pleasant news to hear."

traits.locale_text: "Senin türünden ve aşırı dikkatlerinden kaçındığımı biliyorsun. Birkaç mon-keigh'nin dikkatini dağıtıp yanlarından sıyrılmak oldukça kolaydı..." {n}Seninle göz göze gelen Yrliet anlayışlı bir şekilde başını sallıyor.{/n} "Sanırım bu senin için kötü bir haber."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
